name: 20 Seconds To Earth
description:
Look..If you had one shot or one opportunity to seize everything you ever wanted. In one moment. Would you capture it or just let it slip? 

Yo, you have 20 seconds to make sure you don't lose yourself in the moment. You only get one shot, do not miss your chance to blow. This opportunity comes once in a lifetime, literally. Or you'll blow up in space.

List any content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission.

Sci-Fi Interior

Star-Creator
